GUI

Class Store

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.Store

  • public class Store
extends java.lang.Object
    A Store class that holds information regarding the current state of the store. This is a singleton pattern class. Only one instance of this class can be made.
    Author:
    Gary Bagnall

        Parameters:

        Loads the sales from a CSVB
        Parameters:
        log - the sales log data passed in from reading a csv
        Throws:

      • generateManifest

        public java.lang.String generateManifest()
        Creates a new manifest and passes in the store's current inventory Adds the reordered stock to inventory removes the capital.

        the manifest in a CSV format
